title: The Australian Opera favourites
brief_description: Presented by Peter Ross, this video brings together a popular selection of extracts from some of the world’s best operas. Highlights from the Australian Opera productions of ‘La Boheme’, ‘Il Trovatore’, ‘Tosca’, ‘A Masked ball’, ‘Lakme’, ‘La Traviata’, ‘The Merry widow’.
